text: Hemagglutination inhibition (HAI) assays were performed by incubating 4 HAUs of influenza pH1N1 virus with 2-fold diluting heat-inactivated sera in V-bottom 96-well plates and using 1% chicken erythrocytes. The HAI titer is presented as the reciprocal of the highest dilution of serum that completely inhibited hemagglutination.
